description: These mushroom tartlets have a light crunch with cheesy topping.
name: Wild Mushroom Tartlet Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g mixed mushrooms, washed, drained and sliced
1 medium white onion, peeled and diced
300g vegan pastry, store bought and chilled

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Heat up a pan to a medium heat with the canola oil and fry the mushrooms, onions and garlic for 6 minutes while tossing.
Roll out your chilled pastry and cut into 4 squares. Roll up the edges of the squares to create a small dip in the center for your filling.
Transfer the fried vegetables into the center of each pastry and cover with the vegan grated cheese.
Bake in the oven for 15 minutes or until the pastry is nicely browned. Serve with chives to garnish and seasoning to taste.
